Name: The Getaway (AKA Cynar Daiquiri)
Ingredients: 15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: The bitter vegetal taste of Cynar turns this Daiquiri into a digestif.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2012 by Wayne Curtis at The Passenger, Washington D.C., USA.
Nutrition: One serving of The Getaway (AKA Cynar Daiquiri) contains 154 calories
